channel.title: Server ip help?
channel.description: yeh um.. I finally got my server fixed to where itd run but when i run it, it loads onto the ip 0.0.0.0.... How do I change this? Im not even for sure it lets other people on it or not.. please help :D[br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2007, 05:13:36 AM[/size][hr]this is sorta a bump so i can get some help :P was in 2nd page n im dien to fix my server up :D so dont slaughter me for double post plz

item.title: Server ip help?
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

Try getting hamatchi and get your IP of there… then use no-ip and enter the IP there so others can join!

There are many posts on how to get no-ip & hamatchi working but i will explain it as best as i can!

1) Download hamatchi (search google for "hamatchi") 2) when you login to hamatchi you will see a code at the top. This is called your static IP mine is 5.166.244.39 3) Write down this code and go to www.no-ip.com 4) Create a new account if you havent got one already 5) Click add in the hosts/redirects menu 6) Enter your servers name and select no-ip.org from the dropdown menu 7) In the IP Address section enter the IP you got off hamatchi 8) Click Create Host and then you type [i]servername[/i].no-ip.org in the Server IP in moparscape and others can join your server

Hope this helped

Read full topic
